title: Business Story
description1: Based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, BCP was created to ease the journey in finding a compatible business partner. The difficulty of a successful business connection starts at the search. Finding a business partner requires trust, compatibility, and compromise.
description2: With our multinational team of AI experts, we build an intelligent B2B connection platform that turns advanced artificial intelligence into an efficient partnership tool.
visionDescription: We believe in a world where every business finds their ideal partner.
missionDescription: Through advanced AI technology, BCP breaks down all barriers, opening up effective collaboration opportunities for all organizations, large and small.
